name: PATHOS
description: In PATHOS, a resilient mind is strangled by tragedy and loses its order. Through 150+ sokoban-style puzzles (including some of the hardest ever made for Steam), follow Ego as it works desperately to put back together a brain thatâ€™s losing the will to fight.
